requirements.cpu_arch: Linux x86-64, ARM 32/64, Windows x86-64, IBM POWER8, x86/i686

services.name: phpmyadmin
services.description_cn: 数据库可视化管理工具

command_comments.comment_cn: .env文件的SITE_NAME需要修改成公网IP或者域名才能被外网访问
command_comments.comment_en: .env file's [SITE_NAME] should  be changed to public IP or domain name to be accessed by Internet

command_comments.comment_cn: 默认启动的是ERPNext12，如果您想运行ERPNext13,只需将ERPNEXT_VERSION、FRAPPE_VERSION修改成v13
command_comments.comment_en: The default startup is erpnext12. If you want to run erpnext13, you only need to change ERPNEXT_VERSION/FRAPPE_VERSIO to V13
